name: Green Bean & Tuna Casserole
ingredients: 2 14-ounce cans French cut green beans, drained well

instructions.en: Sauté the onion and celery in the butter until very soft and a little browned, about 20 minutes.
Combine all of the ingredients in a greased 1 1/2 quart casserole or 8x8" baking dish.
Bake at 350°F, uncovered, for 30 minutes or until nicely browned and bubbly.

notes: Freezing is not recommended for this dish. Ensure that the green beans, mushrooms, and tuna are well-drained to avoid excess moisture in the casserole.
